title: Influencers are wondering if they should leave Twitter now that Musk runs the show: ’It’s getting ugly here’
dc:creator: Alexandra Olson, Maryclaire Dale, The Associated Press
description: Many people who have come to rely on Twitter worry it will become too toxic under Elon Musk.
content:encoded: Many people who have come to rely on Twitter worry it will become too toxic under Elon Musk. Read More
